Question: This person died on February 8, 2007 in a Hollywood, Florida hotel room as a result of an overdose of prescription drugs.
Hints: A six-foot-long black granite monument was installed at this person's grave in the Bahamas, in February 2009.
According to Howard K Stern, this person's longtime partner, she was devastated over her son's death.
In late 2006, this person was granted permanent resident status in the Bahamas by Immigration Minister Shane Gibson.
